marklogic.body: The way I look at the situation is this... regardless of whether or not this is a PR move to take the Heat Off Apple, if the changes actually do benefit the workers in a substantial way then the end result is the same, good intentioned or not.Â If I was working in the factory and I had all my lost overtime recovered and my living conditions improved, I don't think I'd care if it was because Apple wanted to look better or because they genuinely wanted to improve things out of the goodness of their hearts.Â Either way, I'd be getting the money I deserve and better living conditions.Â Let's keep our eye on the prize here, and that is the wish for a change for the better, regardless of the motivation behind it.
